question: The Dry Swab Direct RT-PCR testing method was developed by which of the following organizations?
option1: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER)
option2: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research-Centre for Cellular and Molecular Biology (CSIR-CCMB)
option3: Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR), Mumbai
option4: Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology (IIST), Thiruvananthapuram
answer: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research-Centre for Cellular and Molecular Biology (CSIR-CCMB)
explanation: The Dry Swab Direct RT-PCR testing method was recently approved by the Indian Council of Medical Research to test the covid-19 virus. It is an RNA extraction testing method. The method was developed to scale up the testing of the virus in the country by two to three fold.
